rows.label: tev072701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Han'barac about the bodies of the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Han'barac if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Han'barac about the bodies of the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Han'barac about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Han'barac about the Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0001
rows.name:
We Orphe possess regenerative properties far beyond
those of your species.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0002
rows.name:
If we were to lose a limb or two, we would regrow it
by the next day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Unlike your people, we have no need for replacement
parts. It is an extremely convenient trait to possess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Would you care to see a demonstration?
Feel free to grab an arm and tear it off.
The new one will begin growing at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0005
rows.name:
I think you'll find it to be quite the fascinating
phenomenon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0010
rows.name:
A BLADE called Julius has been a big help to me since
I arrived at this city. But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, he seemed quite interested in the way our Ovah
protects our bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0012
rows.name:
He was constantly trying to convince me to provide him
with a blood sample. It made me rather uncomfortable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0013
rows.name:
Of course, I respect our alliance with your people,
and would be happy to provide you with anything that
I can give.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG0014
rows.name:
But this is the one thing I cannot part with.
The Ovah that flows through our blood is everything
that makes us Orphe who we are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1001
rows.name:
We Orphe possess regenerative properties far beyond
those of your species.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1002
rows.name:
If we were to lose a limb or two, we would regrow
it by the next day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1003
rows.name:
I wish I could tear off one of my arms to show you
how it works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1004
rows.name:
But Julius and I have agreed that we Orphe should
avoid spilling our blood needlessly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1005
rows.name:
If, in some strange fluke, another xenoform were to
absorb our blood and our Ovah, it could be extremely
dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1010
rows.name:
My people have never spoken of our blood to beings
from another world before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1011
rows.name:
Our Ovah is so sacred to us that the idea of
outsiders meddling with it is almost unimaginable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1012
rows.name:
But if we withhold detailed information about
ourselves from each other, then our hands will be
tied when we need to resolve incidents like this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1013
rows.name:
So I will put my trust in you, and provide information
about our blood to Julius.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1014
rows.name:
Please do not betray this trust. The information I'm
providing contains literally everything that defines who
we Orphe are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1019
rows.name:
I don't know where he heard of it,
but a Nopon asked me for Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1020
rows.name:
Theoretically, the Ovah should not be able to establish
compatibility with a lifeform unless its structure is
extremely primitive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1021
rows.name:
Still, it is hard to view the Nopon as higher lifeforms.
Perhaps there is some danger they may actually
be compatible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1022
rows.name:
Hmmm. I think the best course is to tell them that,
during division, our life savings are halved as well.
That should put them off of trying to emulate us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072701_MSG1023
rows.name:
I hate to lie, but I will do what I must to protect our
Ovah. I would be most grateful if you would back me
up on that story.[ST:wait ]
